title: [Large-scale] Exploring and Applying Physics Concepts Through Making Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic electrical circuit theory and understanding of physical inquiry methods
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners, focusing on smartphone-based making activities, with project-based assessments to measure learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles and applications of electrical circuits through making projects.
Learners can analyze physical phenomena and propose solutions using inquiry-based learning methods.
Learners can demonstrate conceptual application skills by designing and executing making projects with personal significance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
